description:
Historically based war/economy game that allows players to relive or rewrite the history of Western civilizations, focusing on the years between 500 B.C.E. and 500 A.D.

The project is highly ambitious, involving state-of-the-art 3D graphics, detailed artwork, sound, and a flexible and powerful custom-built game engine.

#### Disk requirements
Install file is about 1357.50 MB and extracts to about 3.33 GB.
summary: Open-source, cross-platform, real-time strategy (RTS) game of ancient warfare
author: Wildfire Games
